descriptionParagraphs.name: Short Description
content: Reach is an internal communications app and pocket intranet that boosts engagement, retention, and connection for all employees regardless of where they work.

descriptionParagraphs.name: Business need or problem
content: LiveTiles Reach is the mobile communication app designed to live up to your vision and goals regarding employee engagement, user adoption, enterprise grade connectivity and security. Engage your employees in an integrated experience by reaching them with company news, connecting them with social posts, providing structured content and knowledge in pages, giving access to skills and colleagues in a people directory and fostering learning and in-person contact on events and trainings.

descriptionParagraphs.name: Business solution
